backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing password update and hint text changes tied to specific frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries mapping various frontend files to their roles in the Valentine app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme with OKLCH color variables and dark‑mode overrides for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app with Valentine‑themed title and metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling password gating, Valentine interactions, state management, and session persistence.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGateView: Password entry UI with unlock flow, error handling, loading state, and fixed hint text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication context and provider managing login, identity loading, and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Romantic‑themed Tailwind variables and animations defining the app’s global visual style.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, container settings, extended color palette, radii, shadows, and custom keyframes with plugin imports.
project_state.json: JSON state file describing the project’s purpose, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented feature metadata for the Valentine proposal app.
